resources.string:
Wi-Fi Direct is available when Wi-Fi is turned on without whether device is connecting AP.

Some devices which support Wi-Fi Direct have to turn on Wi-Fi Direct separately.

This dialog may appear again while turning on Wi-Fi. If this dialog appear repeatedly,
1. Go to Settings
2. Find Wi-Fi Direct
3. Turn on Wi-Fi Direct
This device is group owner.\nWaiting for completing connect.
This device is group member.\nWaiting for completing connect.
Complete connect.\nGroup owner has to click START button.
Need Wi-Fi Direct group to start.\nClick DISCOVER to find other devices and connect them.
This device is group owner.\nClick START button.
This device is group member.\nGroup owner has to click START button.
BUSY - Try again after a while
P2P_UNSUPPORTED - This device doesn\'t support Wi-Fi Direct
